name: NeyNey?
description:
This is a mobile game (AppStore back in the day) we have developed and released in 2019. It is a Turkish only trivia icon-guessing game. It got some attention on release but we were overly underprepared at the time. Later I made it into a progressive web application by disabling store features.

Will only work on a mobile browser as it was never intended to work on desktop.

You can install it to your mobile apps on: https://neyney.alinacierdem.com/

Other contributors:

https://www.linkedin.com/in/bugrasulukcu/

https://kayrakurt.com/
